title: Fantasy RPG Orchestra Music Pack
description: 11 loopable, orchestral music tracks designed for fantasy rpg and action-adventure titles like Soulsborne, Hollow Knight, or Breath of the Wild
longDescription:
This pack contains 11 loopable orchestral music tracks and more than 40 minutes of music designed for fantasy-adventure rpg titles. Perfect for world exploration, town hub, and battle themes.


You can listen to the music pack in full before purchase here:

https://soundcloud.com/aleksis_tristan_shaw/sets/fantasy-rpg-orchestra


TRACKLIST:


Prologue (LOOP) [2:50]


Guiding Spirit (LOOP) [8:32]


Provincial Village (LOOP) [4:57]


The Apothecary (LOOP) [1:57]


Ransacked and Pillaged (LOOP) [2:03]


A Hero’s Journey (LOOP) [5:03]


Sacred Shrine (LOOP) [4:39]


Preparing for War (LOOP) [3:12]


Desperate Moment (LOOP) [1:27]


Narrow Escape (LOOP) [4:21]


Epilogue (LOOP) [1:46]
